Title: Zendframework potential Cross-site Scripting vector in `Zend_Service_ReCaptcha_MailHide`
Description: `Zend_Service_ReCaptcha_MailHide` had a potential XSS vulnerability. Due to the fact that the email address was never validated, and because its use of `htmlentities()` did not include the encoding argument, it was potentially possible for a malicious user aware of the issue to inject a specially crafted multibyte string as an attack via the CAPTCHA's email argument
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.7.0 before 1.7.9, all versions starting from 1.8.0 before 1.8.5, all versions starting from 1.9.0 before 1.9.7
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.7.0, all versions starting from 1.7.9 before 1.8.0, all versions starting from 1.8.5 before 1.9.0, all versions starting from 1.9.7
